I think it was the spam of someone running a highly illegal
interkingdom betting pool of some sort (the laws regarding raffles
are pretty strict), and the someone is no longer on this list.

messages.subject: The best parenting support and message board on the web
messages.msgSnippet: http://lets-yada-yada-yada.com A lot has gone on since our last bulletin.  Many babies have been born and BlessedMomof3 won our 50/50 Raffle.... a prize of
messages.messageBody:
http://lets-yada-yada-yada.com

A lot has gone on since our last bulletin. Many babies have been born
and BlessedMomof3 won our 50/50 Raffle.... a prize of over $150.00!!!

I would like to personally welcome all of the new members who have
come over from She Knows and Baby Center, please make yourself at
home!!!

Also, get ready for our HOLIDAY RAFFLE!!!!!!!!!!! It will run from
11/1 - 12/15, just in time to give you tons of extra holiday spending
money!!! The raffle jackpot will START at $50.00!!!!


Come try your luck to win big money - if everyone buys a ticket, you
have a chance of winning over $900.00! So tell your friends and lets
get that jackpot gigantic!!!!

How does it work?
** You buy a ticket or two or three or four
** You encourage your friends to buy tickets
** The money starts piling up
** The winner gets 50% of the money collected for the raffle tickets,
plus the additional $50.00 starting jackpot!!!

Hmmmmm, Looks like easy money to be earned....
IT IS!! Say 10 tickets are purchased, you will win $5.00!! And it
can add up quickly!
10 tickets sold = $5.00 in your pocket + the $50.00 starting jackpot
20 tickets sold = $10.00 in your pocket + the $50.00 starting jackpot
30 tickets sold = $15.00 in your pocket + the $50.00 starting jackpot
40 tickets sold = $20.00 in your pocket + the $50.00 starting jackpot
100 tickets sold = $50.00 in your pocket + the $50.00 starting jackpot
And what if each member buys ONE ticket? THAT WOULD BE OVER $900.00
IN YOUR POCKET!!!!!!!!!!!

Why do you only get 50%?
The rest of the money will be applied to Yada maintenance, Hosting
fees, and more prize money for future contests!!!

You can begin purchasing Raffle tickets on 11/1, and the jackpot
STARTS at $50.00!!

The winner will be determined by an online number random number
chooser and announced on December 15th, 2006!

Details on how to purchase tickets will be available on Yada's home
page at http://lets-yada-yada-yada.com in the upcoming days!!
